name: Quarto Login Demo
postCreateCommand: chmod +x /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/check_versions.sh && /opt/conda/bin/conda init bash && grep -qxF 'if conda info --envs | grep -q "quarto-env" && [ "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" != "quarto-env" ]; then conda activate quarto-env; fi' ~/.bashrc || echo 'if conda info --envs | grep -q "quarto-env" && [ "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" != "quarto-env" ]; then conda activate quarto-env; fi' >> ~/.bashrc && grep -qxF 'if [ -z "$CHECKED_VERSIONS" ]; then /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/check_versions.sh; export CHECKED_VERSIONS=1; fi' ~/.bashrc || echo 'if [ -z "$CHECKED_VERSIONS" ]; then /workspaces/Coding-Lessons/.devcontainer/check_versions.sh; export CHECKED_VERSIONS=1; fi' >> ~/.bashrc
